ComicInfo.Penciller: George Roussos,Henry Boltinoff,Jack Sparling,Lee Elias,George Roussos,Lee Elias,Jack Sparling,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Prophetic Mirages: Gabe Larson has made millions manipulating the stock market. While he's traveling on an African safari, the Green Glob causes him to see three visions of the future. When two of them come true, he realizes that he can use what he saw in the third to make another fortune. However, that vision does not come true and he is financially ruined.
Robot for Hire: Professor Sterling's robot invention, Automan, can be hired for various jobs. Rankin, a smuggler, wants to use the robot for crime, but Automan deliberately sabotages the operation and alerts the police, thanks to the anti-evil device installed in him.
The Aliens Nobody Saw!: For some reason, Harry Simpson is the only person who can see a group of aliens building a weapon in the middle of the city, so he has to figure out a way to make everyone else believe him.
ComicInfo.Writer: Bob Haney,Dave Wood,Henry Boltinoff,Otto Binder,Otto Binder,Bob Haney,Dave Wood,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Title: The Prophetic Mirages; Robot for Hire; The Aliens Nobody Saw!
